name: Llama Villa
description:
Shower, feed and shear your llamas!
Play with you
Buy your llamas nice furniture!
Get more and more llamas!
Build a llama villa!

Features
  • Around 1 hour of gameplay
  • Over 70 different types of items to collect
  • Peeing llamas (don't worry it's blurred)
  • Showering llamas (also blurred)


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
